text: Hafþór Júlíus Björnsson (; born 26 November 1988) is an Icelandic professional strongman and actor. In 2018, he became the first person to have won the Arnold Strongman Classic, Europe's Strongest Man and World's Strongest Man. He also played Gregor "The Mountain" Clegane in the HBO series Game of Thrones for five seasons. Hafþór was born in Reykjavík. In March 2017, he was diagnosed with Bell's palsy. He is married to Canadian Kelsey Henson. The couple have one child. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:Icelandic movie actors Category:Actors from Reykjavík Category:Television actors Category:Strength athletes Category:Twitch (service) streamers Category:Icelandic sportspeople
title: Hafþór Júlíus Björnsson
